name: CreateVendor
description:
Creates a new vendor in Freshservice.

This tool is used to create a new vendor in the Freshservice system. It's suitable for situations where an organization needs to add vendor details for future reference or management. The tool interacts with the Freshservice API to register the vendor and returns information about the created vendor.

parameters.name: vendor_unique_id
parameters.description: Integer representing the unique ID of the vendor to be created.

parameters.name: vendor_name
parameters.description: The name of the vendor to be created in Freshservice.

parameters.name: vendor_description
parameters.description: Provide a detailed description of the vendor. This can include services offered, special attributes, or any other relevant information.

parameters.name: primary_contact_unique_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the primary contact. This ID references the contact's requester details such as name, email, and phone.

value_schema.description: Unique ID of the primary contact (Primary contact is a requester. The primary contact name, email phone and mobile number will be referenced from the requester details)

parameters.name: vendor_address_line1
parameters.description: First line of the vendor's address. Specify street name or building information.

parameters.name: vendor_address_line_2
parameters.description: Additional address details for the vendor, such as apartment or suite number.

parameters.name: vendor_address_city
parameters.description: City where the vendor is located. Example: 'New York'.

parameters.name: vendor_address_state
parameters.description: State in which the vendor is located. Provide a valid state name.

parameters.name: vendor_country
parameters.description: The country where the vendor is located. Input a valid country name or code.

parameters.name: location_zip_code
parameters.description: Zip Code of the vendor's location for address details.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Freshservice API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the vendor

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the vendor

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Description of the vendor

parameters.name: primary_contact_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the primary contact (Primary contact is a requester. The primary contact name, email phone and mobile number will be referenced from the requester details)

value_schema.description: Unique ID of the primary contact (Primary contact is a requester. The primary contact name, email phone and mobile number will be referenced from the requester details)

parameters.name: address_line1
parameters.description: Address Line 1

parameters.name: address_line2
parameters.description: Address Line 2

parameters.name: address_city
parameters.description: City

parameters.name: address_state
parameters.description: State

parameters.name: address_country
parameters.description: Country

parameters.name: address_zipcode
parameters.description: Zip Code of the location
